title: Friday, Feb. 3, 2017
description: The biggest story in sports meets the biggest story in politics. And a bloody mission in Yemen reminds us that a new administration doesn’t always mean a new start.
author: thedaily@nytimes.com (The New York Times)
content:encoded: The biggest story in sports meets the biggest story in politics. And a bloody mission in Yemen reminds us that a new administration doesn’t always mean a new start.
